name: CyberGhost 2007 GOTY Edition
description:
Begin your journey with CyperGhost 2007, a fully immersive open world adventure with that fully engages your top of the line GPU. This game features all of the following:

  • Over 75 hours of original gameplay and story telling from creative director and Xanderjam judges choice winner Mightyjor
  • Base building, side quests, and customizable characters.
  • Top of the line graphics that your computer will simply not be able to handle and it will be your fault not mine
  • Online multiplayer, no internet connection required

Controls:
Move : WASD
Aim: Mouse
Shoot: Mouse Left Click
Teleport: Mouse Right Click

**PREORDER NOW FOR OUR DLC WHICH WILL INCLUDE CONTROLLER INSIDE THE GAME**

 

Please submit any complaints or bugs you find in our game to the following website:

https://support.cdprojektred.com/en/cyberpunk/pc

 

 

Made for 60 Minute Jam in 60 minutes. All assets created for the jam.
